title: 224. Andy & DJ CTI: Tom Brady Retires, Truckers Vs. Trudeau & Plea Deal Rejected
itunes:title: 224. Andy & DJ CTI: Tom Brady Retires, Truckers Vs. Trudeau & Plea Deal Rejected
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Tom Brady's retirement post not mentioning the New England Patriots, Canadians supposedly being shocked & disgusted at the people protesting at the nation's capital, and a federal judge rejecting the plea deal for the men who killed Ahmaud Arbery.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Tom Brady's retirement post not mentioning the New England Patriots, Canadians supposedly being shocked & disgusted at the people protesting at the nation's capital, and a federal judge rejecting the plea deal for the men who killed Ahmaud Arbery.
